quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First thing I need you to do is to retrieve the Advent Calendar from the stand. And then, go east. With that over with, place the Advent Calendar on the table within the vault. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: vault
infos.desc:
You arrive in a vault. An ordinary kind of place.

 You make out a cabinet.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The cabinet contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The cabinet is empty! What a waste of a day![end if] You see a table. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the table. You idly wonder how they came up with the name TextWorld for this place. It's pretty fitting.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the table.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: office
infos.desc:
You arrive in an office. A standard one.

 You see a stand. You shudder, but continue examining the stand. [if there is something on the s_1]You see [a list of things on the s_1] on the stand, so there's that.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. You move on, clearly upset by TextWorld.[end if]

You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east.

infos.name: cabinet
infos.desc: The cabinet looks strong, and impossible to break. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

objective: You are now playing a life changing session of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First step, pick up the Advent Calendar from the stand. And then, make an effort to move east. After that, put the Advent Calendar on the table inside the vault. And once you've done that, you win!
